name: sfpwowerscripts-createunlockedpackage-task
friendlyName: Creates a new package version of Unlocked Package
description: Creates a new version of an unlocked package,This task is part of DXatScale/SFPowerscripts
author: dxatscale@accenture.com

inputs.name: package
inputs.label: ID or alias of the package
inputs.helpMarkDown: ID (starts with 0Ho) or alias of the package to create a version of

inputs.name: version_number
inputs.label: Overide the version number of the package
inputs.helpMarkDown: The format is major.minor.patch.buildnumber . This will override the build number mentioned in the sfdx-project.json, Try considering the use of Increment Version Number task before this task

inputs.name: tag
inputs.label: Tag of the package version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Tag og the package version to be created

inputs.name: config_file_path
inputs.label: Config File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path in the current project directory containing  config file for the packaging org

inputs.name: installationkeybypass
inputs.label: Bypass Installation Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Bypass the requirement for having an installation key for this version of the package

inputs.name: enable_coverage
inputs.label: Enable generation of test coverage of this paritcular package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please note this command is takes longer time to compute, activating this on every packaging build might not necessary

inputs.name: isValidationToBeSkipped
inputs.label: Skip Validation of Dependencies,Ancestors etc
inputs.helpMarkDown: Skips validation of dependencies, package ancestors, and metadata during package version creation. Skipping validation reduces the time it takes to create a new package version, but package versions created without validation canâ€™t be promoted.

inputs.name: project_directory
inputs.label: Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project directory should contain a sfdx-project.json for this command to succeed

inputs.name: devhub_alias
inputs.label: Alias/Username of the devhub
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the alias of the devhub previously authenticated, default value is HubOrg if using the Authenticate Devhub task

inputs.name: wait_time
inputs.label: Wait Time
inputs.helpMarkDown: wait time for command to finish in minutes

inputs.name: isDiffCheck
inputs.label: Only run task if package has changed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this box to enable package creation only when the package has been modified

inputs.name: isGitTag
inputs.label: Tag latest commit ID with package name and version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tags the latest commit with the package name and version, upon successful build

inputs.name: set_build_number
inputs.label: Display the package's version number as the pipeline build number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the pipeline's build number to the the package's incremented version number.Useful when one is using NEXT as the build number

OutputVariables.name: sfpowerscripts_package_version_id
OutputVariables.description: The id of the package version that was created

OutputVariables.name: sfpowerscripts_package_version_number
OutputVariables.description: The version number of the package that was created
